snippet: The state appeals court ruled 2 to 1 on Thursday that the state’s right-to-work law applies to 35,000 unionized state employees, rejecting a lawsuit filed by labor unions.
abstract: Michigan appeals court rules 2 to 1 that state's right-to-work law applies to 35,000 unionized state employees, rejecting lawsuit filed by labor unions.
lead_paragraph: The state appeals court ruled 2 to 1 on Thursday that the state’s right-to-work law applies to 35,000 unionized state employees, rejecting a lawsuit filed by labor unions.
